rComments: Zsuzsi was an absolutely wonderful professor. She's so sweet and understanding. I was having a rough quarter, and she was incredibly helpful and a great professor.

Zsuzsi is an absolute sweetheart who truly cares about her students and what she teaches. One of the best professors I've had here at UCSC. If you're interested in teaching languages, this is a must-take. Very applicable and useful info/assignments, lots of discussion, an overall great learning experience. Highly recommended!

Seriously the best academic professor I've had in my three years of school. Truly respects and cares about her students. And the class was fantastic, and very insightful in understanding intercultural communications and even interpersonal communications. I 100% recommend this class for every major. Don't miss out on a great opportunity.
Best professor I have had at UCSC. She is very caring, understanding and respectful of each and every one of her students. I actually looked forward to going to her class and doing the homework!

She is the best teacher at UCSC. In all honest, her class is a pleasure to be in. She is just such a genuine person and you will learn a lot. Take any class she teaches and you will never ever regret it. Thank you to her for being her!!!
She is wonderful. At big schools it is easy to get lost in the mix, but she makes you feel heard and truly cares about your depth of education. Love her!

Abrams went out of her way to help us and made learning very easy. She explained things thoroughly and didn't expect us to know anything unreasonable for first year students. The class was fun, the environment was very casual and not intimidating at all. The tests were almost identical to the study guides. Definitely a great class!

Frau Abrams is one of the greatest teachers I've ever had, by far! She is so sweet and helpful and genuinely cares about her students. This class holds a lot of work, but that's typical for a language course. She is always available to help and I can see myself emailing her next quarter if i have questions about German 2. She's fantastic!

Had her for German II, and she was magnificent! By far she is the best professor I've ever had. She genuinely cares about her students and will take extra time to help you with anything you don't understand. If you regularly attend class & participate, you will do just fine on the tests!

Zsuzsanna is an wesome teacher! Had her for German I and II and she is super SUPER nice! She is really encouraging and really wishes the best for her students to learn. would highly recommend taking her if you want to have a very nice professor.

Great professor! Enthusiastic about second language acquisition. Friendly, helpful and easy to understand! I learned a lot and would recommend taking her if you're wanting to learn German! She's from Hungary!

Zsuzsanna is the best German Professor I've had. She really cares about students learning the language and doesn't like to give bad grades. Some advice (and this should be obvious): you need to work every day to do well. Those mini assignments she gives (ex. look up a new word in the book & define) can make or break you. Very nice Lady. :)
